Translations.Text: Arau niscaya ibraahima te'omra anusarai sakalarae'i antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om nija pratipalakara ocarata bisud'dhacitte upasthita haichila
yetiya te'om te'omra pitrka arau te'omra sampradayaka sudhichila, ‘tomaloke kihara ibadata karaicha
‘tomaloke allahara paraibarte alika upasyaborake bicaraa neki
‘tente bisbajagatara pratipalaka samparke tomalokara dharana ki’
tara pichata te'om taraasamuhara pine drstipata karaile
Arau ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i asustha’
Tara pichata sihamte prsthapradarsana karai te'omra paraa amtarai ga’la
Tara pichata te'om ca'iciti sihamtara upasyaborara ocarata ga’la, arau ka’le, ‘tomaloke nokhoraa kiya’
‘ki ha’la tomalokara, katha nokoraa kiya’
tara pichata te'om sihamtara oparata sajorae aghata karaile
Tetiya (ghurai ahi) manuhe te'omra phale dhapali melile
Te'om ka’le, ‘tomaloke se'iborara upasana karaa neki, yiboraka tomaloke nije'i nirmana karaa’
‘athaca allahe'i srsti karaiche tomalokaka arau tomaloke yi taiyara karaa se'itorao teraemi srsti karaiche’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘iyara babe eta sthapana taiyara karaa, tara pichata iyaka jbalanta ju'ita niksepa karaa’
E'idarae'i sihamte te'omra biraud'dhe cakraantara sankalpa karaichila; kintu ami sihamtaka sampurnaraupe paraabhuta karai dilo
Te'om ka’le, ‘ma'i mora pratipalakara ocaralai gai acho, niscaya teraemi moka hidayata karaiba
‘he mora raba! Moka ejana satkarmaparaayana santana dana karaa’
Tara pichata ami te'omka ejana sahisnu putrara susambada dilo

Eteke yetiya sisuto te'omra pitrra saite calaphuraa karaa arasthata upanita ha’la, tetiya ibraahime ka’le, ‘he mora cenehara putra! Ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i tomaka yabeha karai acho, etiya koraacona tomara abhimata ki’? Putra'i ka’le, ‘he mora pitr! Apuni yi adesapraapta haiche se'itorae'i karaka. Allahara icchata apuni moka dhairyasila sakalara antarbhukta paba’
Eteke te'omloka ubhaye yetiya anugatya prakasa karaile arau ibraahime te'omra putraka talamura karai suraa'i la’le
tetiya ami te'omka mati ka’lo, ‘he ibraahima
‘tumi dekhuna saponara adesa samca'i palana karaila! Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao’
Niscaya e'ito achila eta suspasta paraiksa
Arau ami te'omka mukta karailo eta maha kurabanira binimayata
Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho
Santi barsita ha'omka ibraahimara oparata
E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
arau ami te'omka ichahakbara susambada dichilo, te'om achila ejana nabi, satkarmasilasakalara an'yatama

Arau ami ibraahimara oparata barakata dana karaichilo arau ichahakbara oparato; arau te'omloka ubhayerae bansadharasakalara majata achila kichumana satkarmasila arau kichumana achila nijara prati spasta atyacarai
Arau arasye ami anugraha karaichilo mucha arau haraunara prati
Arau te'omloka ubhayake lagate te'omlokara sampradayako ud'dhara karaichilo mahasankatara paraa
Arau ami sahaya karaichilo te'omlokaka, phalata te'omloke bijayi haichila
Arau ami ubhayake bisada kitaba pradana karaichilo
Arau ubhayake ami paraicalita karaichilo sarala pathata
Arau ami te'omloka ubhayarae babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho
Mucha arau haraunara oparata barsita ha'omka chalama (santi arau niraapatta)
E'idarae'i ami satkarmasilasakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'omloka ubhaye achila amara mumina bandasakalara antarbhukta
Arau iliyacho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta
Yetiya te'om nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane’
‘tomaloke ba'alaka ahbana karaa neki? Athaca paraityaga karaa sarbattoma srastaka
‘allaha, teraemi tomalokara raba, arau tomalokara purbararti pitr-purausasakalorao raba’
Kintu sihamte te'omka asbikara karaichila, seye sihamtaka arasye (sastira babe) upasthita karaa ha’ba
Kintu allahara ekanistha bandasakalara katha sbatantra
Arau ami te'omra babe parabartisakalara majata sunama-sukhyati raakhi dicho
Santi barsita ha'omka iliyachara oparata
Niscaya e'idarae'i ami satkarmasila sakalaka puraskrta karao
Niscaya te'om achila amara mumina bandasakalara an'yatama
Arau niscaya luto achila raachula sakalara antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya ami te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargara sakaloke ud'dhara karaichilo
kerala pichata raai yoraa sakalara antarbhukta ejani brd'dhara bahirae
Tara pichata arasistasakalaka ami sampurnaraupe dhbansa karaichilo
Arau niscaya tomaloke sihamtara dhbansa praapta ancaledi atikrama karaa puraara bhagata
arau raatito. Tathapi'o tomaloke buji noporaane
arau niscaya i'unucho achila raachulasakalara antarbhukta
Smarana karaa, yetiya te'om boja'i nauyanara pine pala'i ga’la
Tara pichata te'om lataraita yogadana karaile arau tata te'om paraabhuta sakalara antarbhukta ha’la
Tara pichata eta danara mache te'omka gili pelale, arau te'om nijake dhikkara di achila
Arau te'om yadi allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai sakalara antarbhukta naha’lehemtena
tente te'om punaraut'thanara dina laike machara petate'i thakilehemtena
